name.description: A unique identifier for the asset bundle. Use lowercase letters, numbers, and underscores only.
name.markdownDescription:
**Asset Name**  
A unique identifier for the asset bundle. Use only lowercase letters, numbers, and underscores.  
Example: `my_asset_01`

version.description: Semantic version of the asset (e.g., '1.0.0', '1.0.0-rc.1', '1.0.0+build.123'). Update this when making changes to the asset.
version.markdownDescription:
**Version**  
Semantic version of the asset following [semver](https://semver.org/) specification. Examples: `1.0.0`, `1.0.0-rc.1`, `1.0.0+build.123`. Update this field whenever you make changes to the asset.

title.description: A human-readable name for the asset bundle, shown in the DNAnexus UI.
title.markdownDescription:
**Title**  
A human-readable name for the asset bundle, displayed in the DNAnexus UI. Make it descriptive and clear for users.

description.description: A detailed explanation of what the asset bundle does, its purpose, and any important usage notes.
description.markdownDescription:
**Description**  
Provide a detailed explanation of the asset bundle, its purpose, and any important usage notes. Use Markdown for formatting.

distribution.description: The base operating system for the asset. Only 'Ubuntu' is currently supported.
distribution.markdownDescription:
**Distribution**  
The base operating system for the asset. Only `Ubuntu` is supported.
markdownEnumDescriptions: The only supported OS distribution for DNAnexus assets. [Learn more](https://ubuntu.com/)

release.description: The Ubuntu release version for the asset (e.g., '24.04'). Must match the runSpec.release of the app(let) that uses this asset.
release.markdownDescription:
**Release**  
The Ubuntu release version for the asset (e.g., `24.04`). Must match the `runSpec.release` of the app(let) that uses this asset.

execDepends.markdownDescription:
**execDepends**  
List of software dependencies required by the asset. See [execDepends.schema.json](./execDepends.schema.json) for details and supported fields.

instanceType.description: DNAnexus instance type (e.g., 'mem1_ssd1_v2_x8') used to build the asset bundle. Choose based on resource requirements.
instanceType.markdownDescription:
**Instance Type**  
DNAnexus instance type (e.g., `mem1_ssd1_v2_x8`) used to build the asset bundle. Select based on your resource requirements.

excludeResource.description: List of files or directories to exclude from the asset bundle. Useful for omitting temporary or unnecessary resources.
excludeResource.markdownDescription:
**Exclude Resource**  
List of files or directories to exclude from the asset bundle. Useful for omitting temporary or unnecessary resources.

runSpecVersion.description: Internal versioning for asset builder logic. Usually leave as default unless instructed otherwise.
runSpecVersion.markdownDescription:
**runSpecVersion**  
Internal versioning for asset builder logic. Usually leave as default unless instructed otherwise.
